title: Lattice
description:
Sales and marketing teams spend far too much time wrangling data and not enough time engaging customer and prospects to win deals. Forrester estimates that 80% of B2B firms struggle to manage customer data – which leads to siloed data, wasted budget, and disappointing results. That’s where our open industry-leading CDP comes in.​

Combine siloed customer and prospect data with 3rd party insights to power growth​.
